gdpr_consent_form.title: GDPR Consent
gdpr_consent_form.description: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we are required to inform you about the collection, use, and storage of your personal data.

data_collection.title: 1. Data Collected
data_collection.description: We collect the following data during registration:
data_collection.essential_data: - Essential data: username, email address, password, date of birth to access the application.
data_collection.optional_data: - Optional data: height, weight, goals, fitness level, physical characteristics to personalize your user experience.

data_usage.title: 2. Data Usage
data_usage.description: We use your data for the following purposes:
data_usage.purposes_1: - To allow you to access the application and enjoy its features.
data_usage.purposes_2: - To personalize your user experience based on your goals and fitness level.
data_usage.purposes_3: - To comply with our legal and regulatory obligations.

data_storage.title: 3. Data Storage
data_storage.description: Your data is securely stored on our servers and is not shared with third parties without your consent.

marketing_usage.title: 4. Marketing Usage
marketing_usage.description: We use your data to send you marketing emails regarding promotions, events, or reminders related to the application.

introduction.text_1: It all started with a simple desire: to get back into sports.
introduction.text_2: To do that, the player chose a short hike in the forest, not suspecting it would mark the beginning of a long journey.
introduction.text_3: Originally from Rome, he walks and walks… until he gets completely lost.
introduction.text_4: While taking a break to catch his breath, a hamster suddenly appears in front of him.
introduction.text_5: Not an ordinary hamster: this one talks! Intrigued, they strike up a conversation.
introduction.text_6: Wait a minute… You're from Rome, right? Well buddy… you're closer to Paris than to your bed!
introduction.text_7: Oh, that face you're making. I know, it's surprising. But hey, you’ve walked a lot! Gotta say, you’ve got a good stride.
introduction.text_8: Listen, you're lucky you ran into me. I'm a great explorer! Europe? I know it like the back of my paw. Well, I don’t have paws—pockets, I mean—but you get the idea.
introduction.text_9: If you want, I can take you back to Rome. And while we're at it, we might as well teach you a few things. You like historical fun facts, right?
